title: Forge Commerce
description: It is a API which can be used to make many e-commerce stores with payment integration (please read the README on github first)

title: Forge Store
description: It is the frontend template using e-comm admin API for the data , filters and payment processing

title: RAGVault
description: RAGVault is a CLI tool to use RAG(Retrieval Augmented Generation) in your your terminal using local vector database which does embeddings locally and also answers your queries using default chromaDB LLM or you can use your own LLM
